Roman"; mso-bidi-theme-font:minor-bidi; mso-fareast-language:EN-US;} @page Section1 {size:612.0pt 792.0pt; margin:72.0pt 72.0pt 72.0pt 72.0pt; mso-header-margin:36.0pt; mso-footer-margin:36.0pt; mso-paper-source:0;} div.Section1 {page:Section1;} /* List Definitions */ @list l0 {mso-list-id:1898662446; mso-list-type:hybrid; mso-list-template-ids:515138628 336134145 336134147 336134149 336134145 336134147 336134149 336134145 336134147 336134149;} @list l0:level1 {mso-level-number-format:bullet; mso-level-text:; mso-level-tab-stop:none; mso-level-number-position:left; text-indent:-18.0pt; font-family:Symbol;} ol {margin-bottom:0cm;} ul {margin-bottom:0cm;} --> </style><!--[if gte mso 10]> <style> /* Style Definitions */ table.MsoNormalTable {mso-style-name:"Table Normal"; mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0; mso-tstyle-colband-size:0; mso-style-noshow:yes; mso-style-priority:99; mso-style-qformat:yes; mso-style-parent:""; mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt; mso-para-margin:0cm; mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt; mso-pagination:widow-orphan; font-size:11.0pt; font-family:"Calibri","sans-serif"; mso-ascii-font-family:Calibri; mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-latin; mso-hansi-font-family:Calibri; mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin; mso-fareast-language:EN-US;} </style> <![endif]-->
<p class="MsoPlainText"><SoapBox><o:p></o:p></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText">Being paid by the hour is all well and fine, and it brings in (good) money.<span style="">  </span>However as a longer term strategy I don’t like it.. I’ve worked in too many consulting companies which are hourly (from oil rigs in the North Sea to IT here in NZ).<span style="">  </span>I enjoy the creativity and the freedom to build good products with a longer term view than: is an extra 10 hours on the budget going to be disastrous.<o:p></o:p></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><o:p> </o:p></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText">So, in my company I’m researching how best to do this.<span style="">  </span>However, selling ‘software’ is hard.. many people don’t want to buy it.. it was free back in the bad old days of mainframes.<span style="">  </span>You got it when you bought the hardware.<o:p></o:p></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><o:p> </o:p></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText">So, where does this leave microISV’s?<o:p></o:p></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><o:p> </o:p></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText">I’ve talked to many companies over the last year and most say that to do non-consulting work it is imperative to do work that is:<span style="">  </span>focused, you have a passion for.. and marketing/design/business is equally as important as coding.<o:p></o:p></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><o:p> </o:p></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText">Some of the books I’ve read/reading/got on order are:<o:p></o:p></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><o:p> </o:p></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText">Books:<o:p></o:p></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><o:p> </o:p></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText">4 Hour Work Week – Tim Ferris<o:p></o:p></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText">Bob Walsh Books<o:p></o:p></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText">Joel Spolsky Books<o:p></o:p></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText">Head First C# 3.5<o:p></o:p></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText">Extreme Programming Adventures in C#<o:p></o:p></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText">The Mythical Man Month<o:p></o:p></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText">Coder To Developer<o:p></o:p></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText">Software Craftsmanship<o:p></o:p></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"></SoapBox><o:p></o:p></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><o:p> </o:p></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><o:p> </o:p></p><o:p> </o:p>
<p class="MsoPlainText">My passion and what I’ve been doing for a long time is:<o:p></o:p></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=""> </span>Comms/Networking – from being involved in BBS’s back in the 80<o:p></o:p></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=""> </span>Databases – MySQL (9 years), MSSQL (4 years)<o:p></o:p></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=""> </span>Web Apps – PHP, Flash, ASP.NET<o:p></o:p></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><o:p> </o:p></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText">The products I am looking at building are in the Database/Online area.<span style="">  </span>Projects that I’ve been impressed with recently have been Joel Spolsky’s and Jeff Attwoods Stackoverflow.com<span style="">   </span>Good product, fast, agile, and a quickly implemented.<span style="">  </span><o:p></o:p></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><o:p> </o:p></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText">Areas which I’m involved in are:<span style="">  </span><o:p></o:p></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText" style="margin-left: 36pt; text-indent: -18pt;"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span style="font-family: Symbol;"><span style="">·<span style="font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; -x-system-font: none;">         </span></span></span><!--[endif]-->Farming in NZ through existing contracts.<span style="">  </span><o:p></o:p></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText" style="margin-left: 36pt; text-indent: -18pt;"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span style="font-family: Symbol;"><span style="">·<span style="font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; -x-system-font: none;">         </span></span></span><!--[endif]-->Toastmasters – am president of a local club here.. there is a huge worldwide organisation of toastmasters.<o:p></o:p></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText" style="margin-left: 36pt; text-indent: -18pt;"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span style="font-family: Symbol;"><span style="">·<span style="font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; -x-system-font: none;">         </span></span></span><!--[endif]-->Sports – running/mountain biking.. I’m a long distance racer.<span style="">  </span>Big potential for online products.<o:p></o:p></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText" style="margin-left: 36pt; text-indent: -18pt;"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span style="font-family: Symbol;"><span style="">·<span style="font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; -x-system-font: none;">         </span></span></span><!--[endif]-->Music – I play guitar.<span style="">  </span>A strange market.. most musicians are penniless.. and few are not!<o:p></o:p></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><o:p> </o:p></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><o:p> </o:p></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText">Good point.. I’ve been looking at Empower and Action Packs.<span style="">  </span>Also just buying MSDN. I’ve got trial software timing out in 3 weeks time, and want to do things properly.<span style="">  </span>Also my Vista laptop is blue screening and needs a reinstall of something...<span style="font-family: Wingdings;"><span style="">L</span></span><o:p></o:p></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><o:p><br></o:p></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style="color: black;"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style="color: black;">From a tech standpoint I’ve got a great roadmap..see my blog (<a href="http://www.programgood.net">www.programgood.net</a>) where I’m mapping out what technologies I’m going to be exploring.. the journey to becoming a great developer.<o:p></o:p></span></p>
<p></p>
Entry.Title: Products
Entry.Author: admin
